role.argrole: entity that is able or capable
attribute that ARG0 is capable of doing

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ وَ-) (VP (FUT+IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I -سَتَتَمَكَّنُ) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مَواقِفُ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN ))) (PP-CLR (PREP مِن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اِسْتِيعابِ) (NP (QP (NUM 45) (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أَلْفِ)) (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN سَيّارَةٍ)))))) (PUNC ,) (CONJ وَ-) (S (VP (FUT+IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I -سَتَزِيدُ) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM مِساحَةُ) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مَناطِقَ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المُشاةِ)))) (PP (PREP إِلَى) (NP (QP (NUM 120) (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أَلْفِ)) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مِتْرٍ) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN مُرَبَّعٍ))))) (PUNC ,) (S (CONJ و) (VP (NP-SBJ (NOUN هي)) (NP-ADV (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC حالِيّاً)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM سِتَّةُ) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN آلافٍ)))) (PUNC .))
